name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Muses Wallet | For APOLLO Testnet Only

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A wallet for managing the testing BTC exclusively for APOLLO Testnet by Zeus Network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𐓷 Important Notice: Muses Wallet 𐓷
The Muses Wallet is a Bitcoin wallet that intended ONLY FOR APOLLO (First dApp build on Zeus Network) TESTING PURPOSES. Do not send any real Bitcoin to the Muses Wallet, as doing so may result in the loss of your assets.

𐓷 The Keeper of Golden Ocean 𐓷
zMON, the apprentice of the Muses and loyal keeper of the king of the seven seas, oversees the currents of the Golden Ocean, the largest and most promising of all. zMON played a vital role in maintaining the harmony and prosperity of the vast, glittering waters.

𐓷 Wallet Features 𐓷
- Connect to APOLLO: https://muses.apollobyzeus.app/ 
- Claim testnet BTC
- Deposit and Withdraw testnet BTC
